passive_1: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 2 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to [6%|4%] of target's maximum health and grants you a shield for [160|80] (+ [40%|20%] bonus AD) for 2 seconds (6 second cooldown).

Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 2 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to [8%|4%] of target's maximum health and grants you a shield for [160|80] (+ [40%|20%] bonus AD) for 2 seconds (6 second cooldown).

Hitting a champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to 3% of their maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a [160|80] (+ [35%|17.5%] bonus AD) shield for 2 seconds ([6|12] second cooldown).

Hitting a champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to 3% of their maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a [160|80] (+ [35%|17.5%] bonus AD) shield for 2 seconds ([8|16] second cooldown).
passive_4: Empowers your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration and 5 bonus movement speed.

passive_1: Hitting a champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals bonus physical damage equal to 6% of their maximum health and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a [160|80] (+ [35%|17.5%] bonus AD) shield for 2 seconds ([8|16] second cooldown).

motd: Bugfix: Fixed a bug where triggering Glacial Augment would incorrectly count toward triggering Ever Rising Moon.

motd: Bugfix: Passive cooldown no longer ignores item haste granted from rune: Ingenious Hunter.
